risk_flags.message: Multiple workflow iterations likely needed due to undefined state definitions and role permissions
Potential challenges in creating granular content state tracking and role-based access controls
Lack of specific technical requirements and approval process details increases implementation risk
Performance expectations are not clearly defined, which may lead to scalability challenges

suggestions: Define explicit workflow states (Draft, In Review, Approved, Published, Archived) with clear transition criteria and responsible roles
Create a detailed RACI matrix specifying exact permissions for content creators, editors, reviewers, and publishers with granular access levels
Document specific performance metrics for workflow efficiency, including maximum time-to-publish and review cycle duration expectations
Include technical requirements for workflow system, such as integration capabilities, audit logging, and potential platform compatibility constraints
Design a flexible role-mapping mechanism that allows dynamic permission adjustments without requiring complete system reconfiguration

risks.description: Undefined workflow states and role permissions create significant implementation complexity and potential system design challenges
risks.mitigation: Create comprehensive RACI matrix with explicit workflow states, detailed role permissions, and clear transition criteria

risks.description: Lack of specific technical requirements and performance expectations increases risk of expanding scope during implementation
risks.mitigation: Document precise technical requirements, performance metrics, and system integration constraints before development begins

risks.description: Potential technical challenges in creating granular content state tracking and role-based access controls
risks.mitigation: Conduct thorough technical design workshop, prototype role-mapping mechanism, and validate microservices architecture compatibility

risks.description: Multiple workflow iterations likely needed due to requirements ambiguity
risks.mitigation: Implement iterative design process with frequent stakeholder validation and incremental refinement of workflow specifications

blocking_issues: Lack of specific technical implementation constraints
recommendations: Define explicit workflow states with clear transitions
